```{r setup}
library(ppjsdm)
library(spatstat)
remove(list = ls())

source("../R/get_qld.R")

set.seed(1)
```

We begin by loading the data with the two most prevalent species.

```{r}
qld <- get_qld(prevalent = 2)
configuration <- qld$configuration
window <- qld$window
```


```{r, fig.height = 4, fig.align = 'center', fig}
par(mar = c(5, 4, 4, 13) + 0.1)
plot(configuration, window = window)
```
